description:
** Re-enabled stealth mode ** WARNING! Ten nasty farts! This app plays an extremely loud, juicy fart noise! Fart Bomb is just that; an app you open before you set down your phone and WALK AWAY!! Fart Bomb has over 10 nasty farts to choose from and a customizable timer. After 30 seconds BOOM!! NASTY, LOUD FART!!! Have fun "forgetting" your phone in the meeting you just left, in your roommate's room, in your girlfriends bathroom. Thanks to Mike Koenig for allowing this fart to be distributed under the Attribution 3.0 license.

There is also a version available for the Pixi, so tell your friends!
